1.「こんにちは！ アタシは 記録係マータ。| 不思議の魔塔について 研究するために:
Hello! I'm the archivist. I'm a record|keeper... I'm recording information about the|search for mages in order to research the|
|Mysterious Tower. I'll be recording the|floors climbed, the strength of the mages,|and anything else I need to know for my|
|research. You're kind of adventurous, aren't|you? My name is... I mean... Would you be willing to help me study the|results? If. I'll let you know when you've completed your|achievements and come into this room, and you|can tell me about them. Depending on the|
|achievement, I'll give you a special reward,|the Rainbow Feather Chip... A rare item that|can only be obtained here... I'll tell you|
|the details of the achievements whenever you|talk to me. I'll tell you... Okay, bye. Good|night. I'm sorry. About the search results, I can|confirm...

2.「おつかれさま <pc>。| 探索の実績について 確認できるわよ。|<break: Good work, <pc>.|I can show you the achievements that you've|earned so far.|<break>

7.「何について 聞きたいのかしら？|<break>: What would you like to know?|<break>

8.「『実績』は 塔の研究のため 調べたい内容で| 探索して <pc>に達成してほし:
"Results" is what I want to look up for my research on the tower| Explore I want you to achieve... The achievements are|a testament to your research. We're still in|the early stages of researching the tower,|
|but as we get higher and higher, the|achievements may increase. You can check out|the achievements by going to "View|
|Achievements"...

9.「塔の探索を すすめる中で| とくに 大きな 実績を達成したとき| アタシから:
As you explore the tower, if you achieve a|particularly large achievement, I'll give you|a "special reward". You can only get the|
|special reward once, but I've prepared|something really good for you, so try your|best to get it. You can check your|
|achievements for special rewards by going to|"View Achievements".

10.「この不思議の魔塔の 仕組みを解き明かして| 立派な考古学者になるのが アタシと:
My brother and I are trying to figure out how|this magical tower works and become great|archaeologists. At the academic conference,|
|there was a man who researched a far ancient|tower and presented a grand paper on it, and|he was very cool and I admired him... My|
|brother and I are also studying this magical|tower with the aim of making such a grand|presentation. I think I can do it with the help of... By|the way, my brother is supposed to come to|the tower too, but he hasn't arrived yet...|
|He's not very good with directions, so he's|probably lost...

12.「どの報酬を 受け取りたいのかしら？|<break>: Which reward would you like to receive?<break>

13.「……あれ？ どうやら <pc>に| 渡せる特別報酬は まだ ないみたい。| 実: Hm? I don't have any rewards for you at the|moment. Come back when you've completed more|achievements.|<break>

14.「……あれ？ どうぐかばんが いっぱいだね。| 荷物を 整理してから また来てね: Looks like your bag's too full. Make some room|and then come back.<bw_break>

15.「まだ 特別報酬を 受け取ることは| できないわ。|<bw_break>: You're still not eligible for any rewards.<bw_break>

18.「おつかれさま。| <pc>のおかげで 塔のヒミツが| また 解明されたわ。あり: I appreciate your hard work. Thanks to you,|I've discovered the tower's secret once more.|Thank you so much!|<bw_break>

19.「他の特別報酬も 受け取るのかしら？|<break>: Is there anything else you want?|<break>

20.「……っと それは もう受け取り済みの報酬よ。| 特別報酬は 一度だけなの。ゴメ: ...but I've already given that to you. I can|only give that to you once. Sorry about that.|<bw_break>

22.「<pc> おつかれさま！| ４０階を突破したら 新しい 特別報酬として| 『レ:
Good work, ! If you can|reach the 40th floor, you'll get a new reward:|the "Replicard Proof".|
|If you show that to Card Enhancer Rabero|downstairs, he'll make a Replicard for you!|It's a special Card accessory!|
|A Replicard can copy the current effects of|any Ace of Wonders cards you have. It's quite|convenient!|
|Rabero knows all the finer details, so make|sure to talk to him once you get that|Replicard Proof!|
|Anyways, great work as always. I can show you|the achievements you've earned so far.|
